Method Detail

base64_encode

public static java.lang.String base64_encode(byte[] data)
Base64 encodes data. DOES NOT add line-breaks.

Parameters:
data - The data to encode.
Returns:
a String containing data encoded as base64.

base64_decode

public static byte[] base64_decode(java.lang.String data)
Decodes data from base64. Ignores line-breaks and whitespace.

Parameters:
data - The String to decode.
Returns:
An array of bytes containing the decoded data.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input is not proper base64 data.

cb_encode

public static java.lang.String cb_encode(java.math.BigInteger i)
Converts i to a byte array and base64 encodes the result.

Parameters:
i - The BigInteger to encode.
Returns:
String the encoded BigInteger.

join

public static java.lang.String join(java.lang.String[] strings,
                                    java.lang.String separator)
Joins an array of Strings with an optional separator.

Parameters:
strings - The Strings to join.
separator - If strings.length > 1 - add separator between each element.
Returns:
A String containing the joined inputs.

read

public static byte[] read(java.io.InputStream in,
                          long limit)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Reads up to limit bytes from a stream. Throws an exception if there are remaining data in the stream. Protects against accidents when you want to read short data into memory.

Parameters:
in - The InputStream to read.
limit - Read up to this many bytes.
Returns:
An array of bytes no more than limit long.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there are still bytes to read after the limit is reached.

chop

public static java.lang.String[] chop(java.lang.String s,
                                      int chunk_size)
Chops a String into chunks.

Parameters:
s - The String to chop.
chunk_size - The chunk size in characters.
Returns:
An array of strings. If the input is longer than the chunk size, all but the last chunk will be chunk_size long, and the last one will contain the remaining characters.

hex

public static java.lang.String hex(byte[] data)
Writes out data as a string of zero-padded hex couplets.

Parameters:
data - An array of bytes to encode.
Returns:
A String containing the encoded bytes.

concat

public static byte[] concat(byte[]... byteses)
Concatenates some byte arrays.

Parameters:
byteses - The byte arrays to concatenate.
Returns:
An array of bytes containing all the inputs.

toHttpDate

public static java.lang.String toHttpDate(java.util.Date date)
Converts a date to a string in the proper http format - new SimpleDateFormat( "EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss zzz" ).

Parameters:
date - The date to convert.
Returns:
A String containing the date written in http format

Gets the bytes from a string using the US-ASCII charset.

Parameters:
s - The String to decode.
Returns:
An array of bytes.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the platform does not support US-ASCII.

copy

public static void copy(java.io.InputStream in,
                        java.io.OutputStream out)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Copies an InputStream to an OutputStream.

Parameters:
in - The InputStream. Will be read to the end.
out - The OutputStream. Will NOT be flushed or closed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Pass on any IOExceptions thrown whilst copying.

loadCertificate

public static final java.security.cert.Certificate loadCertificate(java.io.InputStream in)
                                                            throws HttpsecException
Load a certificate from a stream.

Parameters:
in - A java.io.InputStream containing a certificate. The certificate can be in binary or PEM format.
Returns:
A java.security.cert.Certificate.
Throws:
HttpsecException - If the certificate cannot be read or parsed.

loadCertificate

public static final java.security.cert.Certificate loadCertificate(java.net.URI url)
                                                            throws HttpsecException
Load a certificate from a url.

Parameters:
url - Try to download a certificate from this url. Can be a file://, http:// or data:// url.
Returns:
An X.509 Certificate.
Throws:
HttpsecException - if the certificate cannot be downloaded or parsed.

loadCertificate

public static final java.security.cert.Certificate loadCertificate(java.lang.String data)
                                                            throws HttpsecException
Load a certificate from a string. Probably one created with pem_encode().

Parameters:
data - A string containing a certificate.
Returns:
An X.509 Certificate
Throws:
HttpsecException - if the certificate cannot be parsed.

toString

public static final java.lang.String toString(java.security.cert.Certificate cert)
Encodes an X.509 Certificate first as DER, then as base64. As in the body of PEM encoding.

Parameters:
cert - The Certificate to encode.
Returns:
A String containing the encoded certificate.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the certificate cannot be encoded.

pem_encode

public static final java.lang.String pem_encode(java.security.cert.Certificate cert)
Produces a PEM encoded X.509 Certificate.

Parameters:
cert - The Certificate to encode.
Returns:
A String containing the encoded certificate.

loadPrivateKey

public static final java.security.PrivateKey loadPrivateKey(java.io.InputStream in)
                                                     throws HttpsecException
Loads a private key from an InputStream. The stream can contain binary or PEM encoded PKCS#8 data.

Parameters:
in - The stream to read.
Returns:
a PrivateKey
Throws:
HttpsecException - If the stream cannot be parsed.

loadPrivateKey

public static final java.security.PrivateKey loadPrivateKey(java.io.File file)
                                                     throws HttpsecException
Loads a private key from a file.

Parameters:
file - The File to read.
Returns:
A PrivateKey.
Throws:
HttpsecException - If the file cannot be found or parsed.

loadPrivateKey

public static final java.security.PrivateKey loadPrivateKey(java.lang.String data)
                                                     throws HttpsecException
Loads a private key from a String.

Parameters:
data - The string to read.
Returns:
A PrivateKey.
Throws:
HttpsecException - If the string cannot be read.

toDataURL

public static final java.net.URI toDataURL(java.security.cert.Certificate cert)
Encodes a certificate in a "data" url.

Parameters:
cert - The Certificate to Encode.
Returns:
A URI of the form data://application/x-x509-user-cert;base64,[certificate data...]
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the produced url is invalid ( which should never happen! ).

pem_encode

public static final java.lang.String pem_encode(java.security.PrivateKey key)
PEM encodes a private key.

Parameters:
key - The PrivateKey to encode.
Returns:
A String containing a PEM encoded private key in PKCS#8 format.
